text: Chu an la wai, tamen chongbai na dui tamen ji wu fu you wu huo de dongxi, tamen shuo:“Zhexie (ouxiang) shi zai an la nali ti women shuo qing de.” Ni shuo:“Nandao an la bu zhidao tiandi jian you ci shi, er yao nimen lai gaosu ta ma! Zanmei an la, ta chao hu wanwu! Ta chao hu tamen suo pipei de yiqie dongxi!”
